description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.rpaon3jF3nCe5eP9]{Theorem (Ex)}

You have consumed enough fortifying chemical concoctions to have negated some of the fear you feel. You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken} condition. If you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}, you need not flee or fight, and if you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked}, you need not drop all held items and flee, but you still cower if you are cornered. You still take the penalties associated with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked} as normal.
